thread.title: catherine McKay
thread.title_full: The Yorkshire Soap Company reviewed by catherine McKay

author: catherine McKay
title: catherine McKay
text:
Have bought from both the shop in Leeds and on line and love the variety an quality of the goods. Have just bought the easter treats as gifts and could not resist buying shampoo, conditioner and hand cream for myself!!
Brilliant service and beautifully wrapped gifts.
